thread.title: Coffee Talk Drinks guide: All recipes to succeed
thread.title_full: Coffee Talk Drinks guide: All recipes to succeed

author: Steve Wright
title: Coffee Talk Drinks guide: All recipes to succeed
text:
Now that Coffee Talk is available for free via Xbox Games with Gold and via PlayStation Plus, we’ve got a listing of all available drinks that you can make in the game.
While all drinks below will net you the Master Brewer Achievement or Trophy, the Gala Had tea-based drink is also required for the Gala Had a Fit! Secret Achievement or Trophy. Moreover, the listing below is helpful when going after the Barista Expert and Barista Guru Achievements and Trophies when playing Endless mode.
Got all that? Then let’s get to it — and be mindful of the order of each drink below as it’s important! We’ve also listed the flavour profile, which may be useful in endless mode as well.
Coffee-based drinks
- Black Lemon: Coffee, Coffee, Lemon (warm, less cool, not sweet, extra bitter)
- Black Magic: Coffee, Mint, Honey (less warm, cool, sweet, extra bitter)
- Caffe Latte: Coffee, Milk, Milk (warm, less cool, not sweet, bitter)
- Cappuccino: Coffee, Coffee, Milk (warm, less cool, not sweet, extra bitter)
- Espresso: Coffee, Coffee, Coffee (extra warm, not cool, not sweet, extra bitter)
- Gingerbread Coffee: Coffee, Ginger, Cinnamon (extra warm, not cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- Ginger Latte: Coffee, Ginger, Milk (extra warm, less cool, not sweet, extra bitter)
- Jahe Tubruk: Coffee, Coffee, Ginger (extra warm, not cool, not sweet, extra bitter)
- Sugar and Spice: Coffee, Honey, Cinnamon (warm, not cool, extra sweet, bitter)
Tea-based drinks
- Gala Had: Tea, Milk, Ginger (extra warm, cool, not sweet, bitter)
- Masala Chai: Tea, Ginger, Cinnamon (extra warm, less cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- Midsummer Night’s Dream: Tea, Lemon, Honey (warm, cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- Russian Tea: Tea, Lemon, Cinnamon (warm, cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- Shai Adeni: Tea, Milk, Cinnamon (extra warm, cool, less sweet, less bitter)
- Teh Tarik: Tea, Tea, Milk (extra warm, cool, not sweet, bitter)
Green Tea-based drinks
- Cough Syrup: Green Tea, Lemon, Honey (less warm, less cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- Green Tea Latte: Green Tea, Milk, Milk (less warm, less cool, not sweet, bitter)
- Marrakech: Green Tea, Mint, Mint (less warm, extra cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- Shin Genmaicha: Green Tea, Green Tea, Cinnamon (warm, not cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- The Grinch: Green Tea, Ginger, Cinnamon (extra warm, not cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
Chocolate-based drinks
- Bitter Heart: Chocolate, Ginger, Cinnamon (warm, less cool, sweet, extra bitter)
- Chocobee Miruku: Chocolate, Honey, Milk (not warm, less cool, extra sweet, bitter)
- Dark Chocolate: Chocolate, Chocolate, Chocolate (not warm, less cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- Spanish Sahara: Chocolate, Milk, Ginger (less warm, cool, less sweet, bitter)
- Spiced Lady: Chocolate, Milk, Cinnamon (less warm, cool, sweet, bitter)
Milk-based drinks
- Bedchamber: Milk, Cinnamon, Honey (warm, less cool, extra sweet, not bitter)
- Le Menthol: Milk, Mint, Lemon (less warm, extra cool, less sweet, bitter)
- Lemony Snippet: Milk, Honey, Lemon (less warm, cool, sweet, less bitter)
- Milky Way: Milk, Honey, Mint (less warm, extra cool, sweet, not bitter)
- STMJ: Milk, Ginger, Honey (warm, less cool, sweet, less bitter)
Endless mode specific flavour profile drinks
Having trouble getting Barista Guru? The drinks above and below should help you get it done quickly. As a guide, here’s how to gauge each flavour profile request:
- No: 0 bars
- Less: 1-3 bars
- Category name (ie Sweet): 4-5 bars
- Extra: 6-8 bars
Some useful combinations (that aren’t named like the drinks above) are below.
- Chocolate, Chocolate, Cinnamon (less warm, less cool, sweet, extra bitter)
- Chocolate, Honey, Honey (not warm, less cool, extra sweet, extra bitter)
- Milk, Milk, Ginger (warm, cool, less sweet, less bitter)
- Milk, Ginger, Mint (warm, extra cool, less sweet, less bitter)
- Tea, Tea, Ginger (extra warm, less cool, not sweet, extra bitter)
- Chocolate, Cinnamon, Mint (less warm, cool, sweet, bitter)
- Chocolate, Chocolate, Milk (not warm, cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- Chocolate, Chocolate, Lemon (not warm, cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- Green Tea, Milk, Honey (less warm, less cool, less sweet)
- Chocolate, Ginger, Ginger (warm, less cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- Coffee, Milk, Honey (warm, less cool, less sweet, bitter)
- Coffee, Coffee, Honey (warm, not cool, less sweet, extra bitter)
- Coffee, Honey, Honey (less warm, not cool, extra sweet, bitter)
- Milk, Mint, Honey (less warm, extra cool, sweet, less bitter)
Coffee Talk heads to Windows PC, Mac and Nintendo Switch on 29 January, followed by a 30 January release on Xbox One and PS4.
This content originally was published in January 2020 and was updated in December 2024.
This article may contain affiliate links, meaning we could earn a small commission if you click-through and make a purchase. Stevivor is an independent outlet and our journalism is in no way influenced by any advertiser or commercial initiative.
